name: Annihilation
victoryScreenHeader: Build Project Sundial and annihilate the world.
victoryString: You have won the nuclear arms race, the fate of the world is now in your hands. Your adversaries stricken with fear, doomed to be buried under meters of fallout. You have won, yet at what cost?
defeatString: You have lost, your enemies have built a world ending weapon, a bomb so powerful it doesn't even need to reach its targets to annihilate them. The fate of the world is bleak, it's complete annihilation assured. There is nothing else to do.
